lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Speaking to an international development conference, Conrow said it appears almost certain that Congress will opt to cut spending for international programs before they cut into domestic programs.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. financial commitment to the banks allows them to substantially leverage their economic strength, by getting assistance from other countries and by borrowing in the capital markets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Deputy Assistant Treasury Secretary James Conrow said he was exceedingly pessimistic that Congress will approve the Reagan administration's proposed 1988 funding for the multilateral development banks.

lst.name: sentence
